Q: Air traffic is increasingly leading to more noise, pollution, and airport
construction. One reason for this is the growth in low-cost passenger flights, often to holiday destinations. Some people say that government should try to reduce air traffic by taxing it more heavily. Do you agree or disagree?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.

Write at least 250 words.

A: Over the last decade, low-cost airline companies, such as HKexpress and Peach Airline, have enjoyed a rapid growth in their business. It is argued that the government should rise the tax in order to reduce air traffic. I completely disagree with it based on following reasons.

To begin with, increasing tax will drop the number of tourists. Tourism, which regards as export of service in terms of economics, is one of the major component in GDP. Thailand is a good example. The entire Thai economy is supported by tourism. If the government impose "air traffic tax" , the economics revenue from tourism will probably go down. Although imposing "air traffic tax" can ease the current situation of air traffic, the economics loss far outweighs the mentioned benefits.

Apart from reducing number of tourists, heavy air traffic tax hinders the flow of talents. Cost of travelling is certainly a major consideration for taking oversea jobs or not. For those professional people who need to travel around the work frequently, such as corporate relationship manager in bank industry, imposing extra tax to them will certainly lower the incentive to work oversea. As a result, it will lead to less opportunities of making business or even no foreign investments and ideas come to our own countries. This explains why the mobility of talents is vital.

To conclude, it is no reason for the government to impose or rise "Air traffic tax" because of loss in tourists and blocking the flow of talents.

鬼佬唔鐘意一言堂
唔好completely agree/disagree
呢啲考試一定有正反意見 同counter agreement.

同埋泰國例子好武斷 雖然無data係手 但我都幾肯定泰國gdp唔係100% 旅遊業貢獻
除非你好肯定係咁同有數據support 如果唔係用entire 會太嚴重

同上一篇差唔多
立一立都見到4-5個grammar 錯 主要係漏s同cliche(professional people->professionals)

可能受時間所限 你分析得唔夠全面 全部economic loss, 少人旅遊都有可能影響國家文化發展或者其他軟實力

最後 我覺得你啲邏輯有啲怪 雖然唔知ielts會唔會捉呢啲
上一篇同第2點都有呢個問題
第2點你結論係額外稅影響人才流動，而同段既結論係人才流動好重要 好似兩件事唔相關，就算相關都要分兩段寫

建議你2正1反咁寫

Essay 最緊要有counter argument
最好每個point都帶正反兩面 等人知你兩面都考慮過 同咁樣可以加強你份文說服力 which is 好似都係ielts其中一樣要
